attributes.action: Allow all town and community council meetings to be filmed to allow easier access by local people to their councils and to ensure rules and regulations are followed properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the government to consider the allowance of council meetings to be filmed so that issues regarding the rules and regulations of local councils are being followed as they should and to allow the general public the access to their council's meetings via other media to see whether the people they elected are behaving and acting in their best interests.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
